captions.text: - So, you're gay.
- Nope, I'm bi.

BuzzFeed presents
Akward Moments When You're a Bisexual Guy
- Jamie, this is my girlfriend Emily.
- Hi. It's really nice to meet you.
- Hi, nice to meet you.
- Come here.
Why are you going back in the closet?
- What?
I'm not.
- When I came out to my parents,
I told them I was "bisexual" too.
So I feel you.

- So, are you worried
that Kenny's actually gay?
- If you had to choose ...

- It doesn't bother you that
he's been with men before?
- Why can't you just pick one?
It's weird.

- I couldn't be with a
guy who's been with men.
All I'm saying.
- But you're, like, actually gay, right?

- So do you guys, like, go
and check out guys together?
- But only girls can be bisexual.

When guys are bisexual,
they're really just gay.
- No.
- Hey, Cory, this is my boyfriend James.
- Hey.
- Nice to meet ya.
- So you're gay now!
It's like a thing that you're doin', huh?
- You're so greedy.
I mean, leave some for the rest of us.
- Let me get this straight. He's bi?
- Yeah.
- I don't know if I can trust that.
- Boys? Girls? Who knows?

- I mean, I'd be worried
that he'd cheat on me.
- No.

- Some floozy from another
bar walks in, sees him.
He's not going to do anything about it?
- So you've been with both, right?
Otherwise, how would you know?
- He's never gonna settle down.
- Oh my God! I love gay guys.

I just wanna, like, squeeze
you together so hard.
- So you like everything.

You gotta get a wicked
amount of ass, dude.
- Oh yeah, what is that Kinsey scale?
- So there's a spectrum, right?
And everyone's on it.

- No, no. It's one or the
other, there's no spectrum.
- Wanna do that one?
- Yeah, that looks good.
- You can just tag and bag everything.
Him, her, her, her, him, him.
Dude, are you hittin' that?
- Nope. Got a boyfriend.
- It's been the worst day.
- Are you bi, too?
I've heard people talking to you all day.

- Oh, God. Finally
someone who understands.
Yeah, I'm really sorry. They mean well.
- Yeah.
- Like, how does that work, though?
Do you schedule it out? Are you like,

"Monday, Tuesday, I'm going
to go for, like, dudes.

"And on like Fridays,
and we'll say Thursdays,
"I'm gonna like, like, chicks."
But then on Wednesday you rest,
because that's like a personal day.

That's for you, you
know, you take your time.

But on the rest of the time,
you're just slaying ass.

comments.author: TheRandomzJake

comments.text:
I am a bisexual girl and I have been asked all of these questions (just 
replace "gay" with "lesbian"). It's so frustrating.
Yes, we are attracted to people of both genders but ultimately we will 
settle down with just one person. No, we are not attracted to everyone. 
Yes, we can be in one solid relationship at a time. No, we are no more 
likely to cheat on our significant other than a straight or homosexual 
person. No, we don't HAVE to have had sex with both genders to know we are 
bisexual. No, we are not greedy.

Get it through your head, people! Jeesh.﻿
comments.author: That American Brunette

comments.text: 1:19 me af XD﻿
comments.author: mia Shall

comments.text: is kenny really bi?﻿
comments.author: Lex Luthor

comments.text:
Gay, Bi, Pans, Demi... What's next? Omnisexual?
The way I see it, you're either male or female and you are either attracted 
to the same sex, the opposite sex, or both sexes. That leaves Straight, Bi, 
and Gay... I don't know why people think there is a spectrum of gender... 
If you have a penis you're a boy, if you have a vagina you're a girl... two 
genders. How you feel doesn't have anything to do with your gender. For 
example, I have a penis which makes me a male, but I like other males... I 
thought females were supposed to like males, so does me liking males make 
me a female? No, it doesn't.

Coming from a bi 17yo, I think most of these terms are just made up so 
people can feel more comfortable in society...﻿

comments.text:
Hello every1^^ I'm Gay :D I'm both gay and gay^^ My friends accept me for

"creature" that accepts us for who we are, for who we are born as! I'm 
actually Daoist^^
I'm currently 15 years old^^ and I will be 16 in 4 months^^
If you are christian, muslim or Jewis (I don't know what it's called) sorry 
for that.
However: If you are, then don't ever just go in 1 way! There are always 
more roads and ways than just 1 to follow and reach the same point!
Tell me some1 who is and isn't gay and haven't ended up dying!
Or: Some1 who takes and don't take the same road to school every day!
Every1 are going to die at some point, and you can't chose what way you 
should go sometimes^^ We are born diffrent with diffrent minds! I'm born as 
GAY! And I can't change it! But something I can change is the view that 
other people have!^^﻿

non issue to you/us﻿
